div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de Aberdene' tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxviij
die mensis aprilis Anno Dominj millesimo quadringentesimo octuagesimo quatro

The said day It was fundyn be ane assis' that Rob lenman is ane
vnlauchfull and ane vnhable' nychtbour' to duell and remain within this
burgh' of Aberdene / for thai fand him a commoune' nychtwalkar' a brekar'
of buthis and housys within the toune And ordanis that he be
deuoydit of the toune / as It sal be sene to the baillies eftir the
ordour of law according for sic trespassouris

Vltima die mensis Aprilis supradicti Willelmus cornelij parcium holandie
Intrauit quandam suam nauim vocat' Katherinam de Browarishavin cum
bonis et marcanciis infrasciptis videlicet duabus lastas cum dimidia de le ber'
quinque barilia frumentj xij barilia ordij vj barilia farine beremele dimidium barile
smygmatis et vnam barile butiri salsis ad centum libras in mensura
vigintj caseis viridis et albis

The said day the hale counsale wele gaddirit and ryply avisit has
ordanit that na man mason' in the luge to sanct Necolace wark sal haf
mar' fra hynefurth' to his yerly fie bot xx merkis / except the
maistir of warkis fie that sal be chosin and his fie tobe gevin as thai
and he can accorde togiddir apon' . /

The said day Johne mor' in presence of Aldirman and baillies becom
full dettour to Wilyeame goldsmyth to pay him at Witsonday next
tocum v s' vij d' for Alan smyth and confessit that the said' Alan sal nocht
be cravyt tharfor' bot he alanerly as his awyn propre dett et cetera

head.add: the feying of mastir John gray maistir of saint necolace wark et cetera

div.p:
The iiijth day of maij anno et cetera lxxxiiijto maistre Johne' gray
mason' was resauit be the Aldirman counballlies counsale and communite of
this burgh' of Aberdene' in maistre of wark to the bigging of
sanct Necolace wark quhilk has takin apon' him tobe continuale
labourand and diligent for the vpbringing of the said wark and to do
al cur' concerning the said' wark that accordis til a maistir of wark
baith' in labouring of his awyn' person devising beseyng and our'seying
of vtheris masonis and warkmen that sal be vndir him for al the dais of his lif
to the finale completing and ending of the said wark at al his possibilite
and power' the best wys' that he can / for the quhilkis thingis tobe done he has
in presence of the baillies counsale and communite forsaidis gevin the grete bodely
aith' tobe lele and trew to the said wark for al the dais of his life vnto
the completing and ending of the same And the said maistir of wark sal
labour' him self and ger' vtheris masonis and warkmen vndir him labour daily
and continualy eftir the Act of parliament made tharupon' / for the quhilkis labouris
and seruice tobe done be the said maistir of wark the saidis Aldirman baillies
consale and communite has promittit to gif yerly to the said maistir of wark
for his fie twenty pundis and fyve merkis til a propyne in al costage
endurand al the dais that he has to lif quhil the said' wark be complete
And the day of his entra to the said wark the day of this present write
And this said some' of xxiij li' vj s' viij d' / yerly' tobe pait til him at
four' termes in the yere proporcionaly as thai and he sal accord' best tharupon'

In curia balliuorum de Abirdene' tenta per balliuos eiusdem v die mensis maij supradicto
Alexander Westland' and Johannes stevinson' pistatores alborum pistrum conuicti sunt per confessio
ne propriam de infrictione Jurium huius burgi pro vendicione certorum mulonum et aliorum
pistrum extraneis absque presentacione eorundem ad forum et cetera Et fuit eis inuictum et ceteris
suis vicinis ne de cetero inueniantur culpabiles dicti criminis sub pena amerciamentj
Jam eis remissi et sub pena Juris temporibus in futuris pmittend'promittend' ad rigorem
In Curia balliuorum burgi Abirdonensis tenta in pretorio eiusdem vij die maij anno suprascripto

Curia legalis burgi de Abirdene' tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem
decima die mensis maij Anno Dominj et cetera lxxxiiijto

Quo die Johannes stevinson vocatus tanquam secunda die ad instanciam Ade andirson Johannis lammynton'
non comparuit quare et cetera

Dauid galichtly vocatus ad instanciam symonis gardin per plegium porrectum
super eundem pro iniusta intromissione cum sarplario pellium non comparuit tanquam
prima die huius processus quare et cetera

finlaus fores' vocatus ad instanciam Johannis lammynton non comparuit tanquam
secunda die quare precipitur seriando ad distringendum et cetera

Mariota sponsa necolaij baxtar conuicta fuit per propriam confessionem pro minusiusta
vendicione ceruicie ad precium duodecim denariorum contra burgi statuta / quare
adiudicata fuit in amerciamento curie et cetera

Relicte quondam Andree Ratre et Johannis Waus similiter adiudicantur in amerciamento curie
ex propria confessione pro infrictione statutorum burgi in vendicione ceruicie ad
precium xij d'

Actio inter Alexandrum traile et Jo Thomam Jamyson penes quartam partem libris
croci et cetera continuatur per balliuos vsque post aduentum dicti thome de Edinburgh'
Iam coram domino nostro rege et suis consulibus summoniti / et in continenti ad
instanciam dicti alexandri Responsurus absque vlteriori dilacione et cetera

Dauid Kintor pro secunda die vocatus ad instanciam Alexandri traile non comparuit
quare et cetera

Wilyeam blindsele bailye in plain courte offerrit to magnus Wormot
to ger' deliuer this day pundis to the seriand to demain as law wil
for xlv s' / grauntit be him awand to the said magnus et cetera

The said day Alexander traile was fundin In amerciament of courte for the
wranguis' borch' streking apon' Sanderis goldsmyth anens certane siluer
halding fra him of certane wark made be the said Alexander to alexander traile
et cetera And the said Sanderis goldsmyth quyte of his challance in tym tocum et cetera

Androw stevinson' and sandy Ryny war' bath fundin in amerciament of the courte for
the wranguis' distroubling of the courte and til amend as law will

Willelmus lynton' deuenit plegius legalis pro Andrea stevinson quod Alexander
ryny et pars sua tota erunt indempnes de dicto Andrea'Andrea' overwrites 'Willelmo'. aliter quam per viam
Juris Et pro dicto Alexandro ryny et fuit complicibus deuenit plegius
legalis Johannes ledale / quod dictis W Andreas stevinson' erit indempnes
de eiusdem aliter quam per viam Juris et cetera

add.foreign: constitucio vxoris magnj Wormot suam procuratricem

div.p:
The xiiij day of Maij anno et cetera lxxxiiijto In presence of the courte magnus
Wormot constitut and ordanit his wif procuratrice for him in al materis concerning him and
quhatsumeuir personis quhar' euir he pas him self ./ And to do for him in his absence that he
mycht do him self and he war' present haldand ferme' and stable et cetera

the said day Johne' stevinson' grauntit In presence of the courte to deliuer to
Wilyeam goldsmyth xl wedy of yrne fracht fre on the key of Aberdene' and sa mekle'
at wantis tharof vnressauit be the said Wilyeam he sal mak it be deliuerit til him
And anens the caldron' or kettill belanging to the said Wilyeam that the said John
sauld in ross' . withoute the said Wilyeamis ordinance as he allegis / the
said Johne' has takin to prefe lauchfully on monunday cum a fyftene dais
that he had in commaund of the said Wilyeam to sel the said kettil and to war'
it hamewartis as he did his awyn' gude et cetera

Robertus Kintor plegius legalis pro Willelmo mor' adiudicatur in quatuor amerciamentis
curie quia non intrabat dictum Willelmum absentantem se quatere et cetera per consilium dicti
burgi de Aberdene iniungitur dicto roberto quod premuniat prefatum Willelmum ad intrandum
ipsum lune proximo futuro subiturum Juris Justicie complementum pro iniuriis per ipsum
illatis et cetera alias dictus robertus In persona sua subibit quidam dictus
Willelmus subire tenebitur et Juri periturus et cetera

The xviij day of maij anno et cetera lxxxiiiijo Johne' of cullan . In presence
of Androw cullan ane of the baillies lindesay herrald' James cummyng John
Wormot and ser Johne' of striueling notar becom souerte be his hand land and gude
for him and al the gentilmen that was with him for the tyme / that this toun' and
al the nygbouris and induellaris of the same sal be scath'les of him and thaim /
In generale and in speciale vthirwais na the cours' of commoune law askis and requiris
vndir the pain of law et cetera

Vicesima die mensis maij supradicti et cetera Johannes bawne receptus fuit in liberum
burgensem et fratrem gilde huius burgi ad requestam Alexandri Irwin de Drum prestito Juramento
solito et consueto et cetera

The said day maistir Hew of Douglas procuratour to my lady his modir
my lord of craufurdis modir that now is comperit in plain courte befor the Aldirman
and baillies and made Intimacion' to thaim In my said ladeis behalue that scho
acht' to haue yerly' of hir tierce of the wattir malis of Aberdene the some'
of xx merkis / protestand that gif the said' baillies pait ony thing of that some'
yer'ly and termely til ony vthir na to hyr or hir procuratouris scho wald'
persew thaim tharfor' as efferis

The same day the Aldirman Baillies and counsale becaus' thai haue fundin
grete fault . In the craft of the cordinaris at this tym . / thai haue put doun'
the dekyn of the said craft . annulland al power' that thai gef to thaim
of befor' . / And wil fra hyne furth' tak the correction' of thaim all in tym tocum
and to punys' thaim eftir thair demeritis that sal be committit in tym cummyng et cetera

The xxij day of maij anno supradicto Andreas michelson' artis sutorie
receptus fuit in liberum burgensem huius burgi ex successione paterna comburgensis
soluendo v s' preposito tantum prestito Juramento solito et cetera

The said day Michel Ranyson' Wilyeam ranyson' Sandy Ranyson'
Androw michelson' Sandy Wylson' and David ego and ilkane of thaim was
fundin in amerciament of the court becaus' thai comperit nocht with thar nychtbouris
for defence of this toun' in suppleyng of the Aldirman baillies counsale and
communite / and was falcyt et cetera et Judicium desuper dictum per os Judicatoris
curie et cetera

The said day Wilyeame lauchlane' alias forbes . that be the avis' of the
Aldirman counsale and communite of this burgh' for his awyn' demeritis was
exilit of this toune / comperit In the tolbuth' in presence of the Aldir
man baillies counsale and communite and grauntit that he had offendit of befor'
and was in wil and gude entent sa that thai wald remit him and tak
him the thar fauouris and relesche him of his exiling he suld oblis' him
in al tymes tocum to forber' and be lele and trew . to thaim all in tym to cum /
quhilkis tuke him in thair' fauouris and pardonnyt him of al thingis bigane
And than he swer' the grete aith' that he suld' be lele and trew to the
said' burgh' and al the inhabitantis of the same in al tymes cummyng And
to do thaim al the gude that he couth' / and to let al evill tobe done' to
thaim at his power' . al the dais of his lif et cetera

Curia legalis tenta in pretorio de Aberdene' per balliuos eiusdem xxiiij die Maij
anno Dominj et cetera lxxxiiijto

Quo die dominus Andreas henrison' . frater et heres Ricardi henrison' quondam
fratris suj Iam nouissime interempti In Judicio comparens . querimoniam fecit
super Johannem Drummy latonium . quod ipse intromisit se cum clauibus domorum
dicti quondam Ricardj fratris suj . vbi bona sibi hereditarie pertinen' in custodia
deponuntur / Requirens prepositum et balliuos vt ipse Johannes custos dictorum
bonorum sibi in futurum respondeat de dictis bonis sibi pertinentibus et vt caucionem
desuper inueniret quj quidem Johannes confessus fuit se claues domum
dictorum bonorum habuisse et Inuenit Dauid menyes seniorem pro se
plegium pro ipso Responsurus et Jure periturus In omnibus que dicto domini
Andree Inposterum incumbere et pertinere videbuntur

Eodem die finlaus forest vocatus tanquam tercia die ad instanciam Johannis
lammynton non comparuit quare precipitur seriando vt distringatur et quod premuniatur
ad intrandum proxima curia legali et cetera

Item Johannis stevinson' vocatus ad instanciam Ade andirson' tanquam tercia die
huius processus non comparuit quare et cetera

The xxvj day of maij anno supradicto Wilyeam eleot francheman becom
souerte to Walter rede merchand of Dunde that gif Duncan myllar' burges
of perth' contentis pais nocht to the said' Walter in his behalue the some' of
xxxvj and iij d' for certane clath bocht / be the said' Wilyeam fra the said' Walter in continent
eftir that he pass' til him tharfor' / that the said Walter bringand' a testimoniale
vndir a baillies sele of perth' that the said some' be nocht pait / that within xv
dais / And this condicion' nochtwithstanding / It was thareftir appointit betuix
thaim / that the said Wilyeam sal pay til henry horum in the said Walteris
behalue within xx dais next eftir the date of the write the said some'
of xxxvj s' iij d' but ony langar delay his hand vphaldin to the aldirman
tharupon'

Curia balliuorum burgi de Aberdene' tenta in pretorio eiusdem vltimo die mensis
maij annj supradicti

Quo die persone subscripte electe fuerunt pro inquisicione
subscripta deseruienda / videlicet gilbertus Waus . Johannes Waus Willelmus goldsmyth
Johannes fechet symon gardin gilbertus chamour andreas ancroft robertus buchan
Robertus ewynson' Willelmus cummyng Dauid louson' murthacus glenmaling
Dauid spens' / Qui Jurati dicunt quod quondam Alexander stokar' consanguineus Johannis
club latoris et cetera obiit vltimo vestitus et cetera de certis terris et croftis . Jacentibus
infra dictum burgum / et cetera Et quod dictus Johannes et legittimus et propinquior
heres eiusdem quondam Alexandri consanguinei suj de dictis terris et cetera cum ceteris
punctis In dicta inquisicione requisitis et cetera

The said day the baillies delayit with assent of Wilyeam goldsmyth the action'
betuix him and John stevinson' anens a kettill / vn to the morn' becaus' the said
John stevinson' send his son' til excus' him quhil the morn' / and than
the matir tobe decidit et cetera but preiudice of ony of thaim et cetera

Alexander chamour Junior vocatus ad intrandum Johannem foular' per plegium porrectum
in manibus moricij beset vnius seriandorum pro minus iusta intromissione cum vno
candelabro ereo andree ancroft pertinen' / non comparuit tanquam prima die
huius processus quare et cetera

Item eodem die murthacus glenmaling plegius pro Willelmo richardson' vocatus
tanquam prima die ad instanciam robertj ewynson' pro quadam summa pecunie
decem marcarum monete sprucie ad bonum compotum / per plegium porrectum
in manibus moricij besat seriandj non comparuit quare' et cetera

In curia balliuorum de Aberdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem quinta die mensis Junij
Alexander de camera Junior attornatus et eo nomine Johannis blindsele fratris et heredis
quondam Alexandri blindsele . presentatuit quoddam breue saisine capelle regie baWillelmo
blindsele vnj balliuorum dicti burgj requirendo eundem quitus sibi nomine dicti Johannis
possessionem et saisinam traderet de certis croftis vocatis le halilandis and ymlawis
ryg infra territorium de Aberdene de quibus per inquisicionem compertus fuit legittimus heres
et cetera Et peticioni sue dictus balliuus annuit et cetera prout de Jure debuit et cetera

Curia legalis tenta in pretorio burgi de Abirdene per balliuos eiusdem xiiijto die mensis Junij
Anno Dominj et cetera lxxxiiijto quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes patent in rotulo sectarum

Eodem die murthacus glenmaling secundo die vocatus ad intrare faciendum Willelmum richartson
ad sectam roberti ewynson pro x marcis monete sprucie saluo iusto calculo non comparuit et cetera

Actio inter fyndelaium fores et Johannem lammynton' respectuatur cum consensu parcium
sub spe concordie vsque hodie ad octo dies sine preiudicio parcium

The xvj dai of Junij forsaid / before Wilyam blindsel balye / Johne talyour' be
virteu of the instrument of power' gevin til him be James mortymar' son and ayr of
quhilum henry mortymer / constitute James lesly of petkapil his verra lauful
procuratour and speciale deput for him and in his absence til persew recovyr and resaue
al ayrschip / and gudis mouabil and vnmoueble pertening to the said James before
quhatsumeuir Juge eftir the tenour of the said instrument / promittand be faith of
his body tohald ferm and stabil quhat thing the said James lesly lachfully
sal do in the said matir before thir witnez Wilyam quelp Wil more philp of
Dunbrek seriand and vthir diuers' And the said procuratour has power' to substitute et cetera

The xviij dai of the forsaid moneth of Junij In the court haldin in the tolbuthe be W.
blindsel and Dauid marr' twa of the ballies comperit cristian Kintor dochtir of quhilum
alexander Kintor burges of abirdene and spous' to Wilyam vldny of that ilk / and constitute for
hir procuratouris hir said spous' / Dauid Kintor Wilyam vldny and James vldny hir'
sonnis til ask tobe kennit til the landis annuel rentis and possessionis pertening til hir be the
deces' of hir fadir eftir the law and consuetude of burgh / promittand tohald ferm and stabil
quhatsumeuir thing hir forsaidis procuratouris coniunctly or seueraly lachfully ledis tobe done

The samyn dai Alexander lesly of wardris constitute george of lesly maistir androw cadiou
and Wilyam of chamer his procuratouris coniunctlie and seueraly til ask at the ballies the actis be
tuix him and James lesly made of before be put til execucion eftir the tenor of thaim
and todo for him tharin like as he war' present / promittand ferm and stable et cetera

The xix dai of Junij yer' et cetera lxxxiiij comperit in the tolbuthe before Wilyam
blindsel and Dauid marr' twa of the ballies of abirdene a nobil man James
Innes of that ilk factour to my lord and lady of huntly / and askit payment
of xix li' x s' of scottis money at the said ballies acht be Dauid hil to
my lady of huntly as assigna to malcum mowat eftir the fourm of the actis
precedand / And the said ballies askit at the said Dauid payment of the
said some or ellis toschaw thaim his gudis strenyeabil for the frething of
him and payment of the some forsaid / And the said Dauid denyit the pay
ment of the said some' and toschaw ony gudis strenyabil tharfor / for the quhilkis
the ballies becaus' Dauid hil passit furth of the tolbuthe atour command'
of thaim of before / chargit morice besat and philp of Dunbrek seriandis
tolok the tolbuthe dur' on the said Dauid and hald him in ward in the said
tolbuthe ay and vnto the tym the said lady or hir factouris be fullely pait
and assithit of the said xix li' x s' togiddir with the costis and expens' made
tharuppon

the said dai Wilyam blindsel and Dauid marr' ballies forsaid has grantit togif
til Dauid hil ane certificacion as acquitance vndir thare seillis for thre
li' g' and v s' g' optenit before thaim apon the said Dauid hil be the assignais
of malcum mowet . And this certificacion he salhaf or he pay a penny of
the pund gretis forsaid

The same dai Dauid hil oblist him be the faith' of his body til content and
pay til a Reuerend fadir bischop Robert blacater thre pund g' v s' g'
of flandris money in the name and behalf of Isabel culan the relict of
vmquhile Alexander howison for the mail of half a nettis fisching of
Done of the yer' bigane and toreleve hir of the said some and topay
it to the said reuerend fadir or to quhatsumeuer vthiris person or personis
it ples' hir wppon the quhilkis alexander rede prelocutour to the said Isabel
tuke instrument of ser John' striuelin notar before thir witnes Wilyam blindsel
Dauid marr' ballies ser robert leis notar John' of Kintor androw goldsmyth
and vthiris sundry

The xxj dai of Junij yer' forsaid / the action betuix Johne of lammyntoun and fynlaw
fores quhilk was delayit to this dai / Is now of new continuit with consent of the
said John and of robert blindsel forspekar for the said fyndlau becaus' of his infirmite
in hoip of concord to this dai viij dais in sic force and effect as this dai

The samyn dai Adam andirson folowit Johne stevinson be a borgh of the wranguis' halding
of xx s' / and the said Johne denyit the some' and tuke topreif al thingis payt
betuix him and the said adam to this dai / to the quhilk preif the ballies assignit this
dai xv dais and falyeand of his preif topay the some

The xxv dai of Junij yer' et cetera lxxxiiij Johne colison becom souerty til Wilyam blindsel
ane of the ballies sittand in Jugement in the tolbuthe for Wilyam Kemp anens a hors cla
mit be Janet chamer the spous' of Wilyam strathachin fra the said William / that the saide
Wilyam sal bring certificacion fra William strathachin within xv dai that he has content and
pait him for the said hors / and falyeand the said John' colisone sal pay to the forsaid
Janet for the said hors xlv s' of siluer and a par' of butis wourth x s' witnes
heirof John' the vaus philp of Dunbrek and vthirs diuers'

The samyn dai It was deliuerit be ane assise alexander rede beand forspekar anent the clame
of sex li' be ane obligacion made be Johne fichet to thomas symson / that gif the said
Johne prefis nocht the obligacione pait betuix this and the law day eftir michelmes
he sal content and pay the said some of vj li' to the said thomas within terme of law / And
heirto the said John' has drawyn be his hand his land and gudis souerty til
Wilyam blindsel balye for the payment of the some' forsaid falyeand of his preifis
and alsfer as he may preve payt salbe allowit

The second dai of Julij yer' forsaid In presence of Wilyam blindsel ane of the ballies It
was appointit and accordit betuix Wilyam clerk on the ta part / and Anne baxtar on the
tothir part anent al clames and debatis to this dai twiching the costis made apon the
nethir' myln the said anne restis awand to the said William ix d' And the for
said Anne is bundin be the faith of hir body with consent of hir husband / that gif
the forsaid Wilyam in tym cuming passis or causis the mylnar' of the myln topas
to the said anne / and schawis to hir that the myln has nede of mending in ony thing
and scho mend it nocht within xxiiij houris thareftir It salbe lesum to the said William
tomak the hail expensis apon the myln / and tohald the multur' tharof quhil
the expensis be pait / And in like wis' the said Wilyam is bundin to the said anne
witnez heirof morice besat thom gardner and vthir sundry

The v dai of Julij fornemmit the balye Wilyam blindsel delayit the preif tobe
made be Johne stevinson anens a kettil clamit be Wilyam goldsmyth
vnto monunday next tocum as dai peremptour with consent of parties

The ballies has assignit this dai xv dais to Dauid galichtly topreif his
payment of viij li' x s' and viij d' of siluer and of xij eln' of canves clamyt be
Wilyam blindsel as dai peremptour

The samyn dai It was fundin and deliuerit be ane assise alexander rede forspekar / that
Duncan lammynton' is quyte of the challance of androw louson of xx s' anens j ox
and the said androw in amerciament for the wranguis' strekin of the borgh tharuppon' et cetera

Anens the action betuix adam andirson and Johne stevinson the said John' comperit before
the ballies in Jugement and in presence of the said adam / schew and producit a decret of certan
arbitrouris for his preif of al thingis pait betuix him and the said adam as this
dai tharto assignit / protestand that he was quite of the said adamis chalance in tym tocum

And eftirwart the said dai adam andirson offerit him tocum before the four' persons
contenit in the decret forsaid / and gif thai fand that he put his clame of xx s'
to thaim and that thai endit that matir that it suld stand as swa / And gif thai
wil declare the contrar' he askis payment of the said some as law wil

Curia tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene per ballivos eiusdem nono die mensis Julij
Anno Dominj et cetera lxxxiiijto /

quo die dominus Dauid vaus vicarius de banf fate
batur se tutorem testamentalem Jacobi mortymer filius et heredis quondam henrici mortymer
burgensis huius burgi / et recepisse ac habuisse bona sibi Jure hereditario contingencia per decessum
dicti patris suj et cetera

The x dai of Julij yer' forsaid comperit before the ballies of abirdene in Jugement in
the tolbuthe of the samen Johne fichet burges of abirdene quhilk had arrestit hald
ane schip and gude furyt be Johne rolyn duelland in auslo in norway on the
behalf of alstane duelland in auslo the quhilk half schip pertenis to the said
Alstane and as the said John' fichet allegit the said alstane had takin fra him
the thrid part of a schip ladyn with tymmyr' and bow staiffis / And the said John'
rolyn offerit him topreve the thrid part of the said schip sauld to the said
Alstane be the said Johne fichet for the some' of aucht pund g' and a half
quhilk some is content and pait / The quhilk action was put to the determinacion
of ane assise of worthy persons quhilkis the gret aith sworn and riply avisit
fand ordanit and deliuerit that the said Johne rolyn suld bring sufficent certifica
cion within yer' and dai that Johne fichet forsaid had sauld the thrid part of
the said schip til the said alstan' for viij li' g' and demi quhilk some' is content
and pait til the said Johne fichet or his factouris And gif it falyeis of
the production of the certificacion within the terme as said is / the said John' rolyn
sal content and pay the forsaid some' of viij li' g' and demj to the said John' fichet
togiddir with his costis and scathis And gif it be fundin that Johne fichet has
wrangwisly arrestit the said half schip he sal wprycht the costis and scathis
sustenit be the said John' rolyn tharthrou et cetera
